name: Korsun '44
summary: HPS Simulations and John Tiller are proud to announce the release of Korsun '44, an operational level World War II simulation. Korsun '44 covers the Soviet encirclement of the German forces at the Dnepr river line which created the Korsun Pocket. With two Ukrainian Fronts smashing their way past the defenders, the Germans quickly found themselves in a difficult situation.
